references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of Federated Learning, introducing the concept of communication-efficient learning for distributed datasets.

references.paper_title: Advances and open problems in federated learning
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of Federated Learning, outlining its challenges, methods, and future research directions.
This paper introduces the concept of one-shot Federated Learning, aiming to reduce communication rounds and improve efficiency.
This paper proposes DENSE, a novel method for one-shot Federated Learning that uses data-free knowledge distillation to improve model performance.

references.paper_title: Enhancing one-shot federated learning through data and ensemble co-boosting
references.reason: This paper proposes Co-Boosting, which improves upon previous one-shot FL methods by using a mutually reinforcing approach to enhance synthetic data generation and model performance.
